info.title: Jump 'n Bump
info.author: Amarth, Daid
info.details:
Jump 'n Bump is a game by Brainchild Design, ported to SDL and now the Wii. Control one of 8 rabbits in a quest to stomp other rabbits on the head and make them explode in bloody bits.

Hold controller sideways to play. Left/right to move, "2" button to jump. Home button on first controller to quit. Nunchucks and classic controllers can also be used to control additional bunnies.
